name: The Powerpuff Girls
summary: The Powerpuff Girls is an award-winning animated action series about three super-powered little girls Bubbles, Blossom and Buttercup with one very big mission: saving the world before bedtime.

episodes.name: Monkey See, Doggie Do / Mommy Fearest
episodes.summary: In "Monkey See, Doggie Do", Mojo Jojo swipes some cursed artifacts from the Townsville Museum and using them, turns all of the people of Townsville and then the whole world into dogs. In "Mommy Fearest", the Professor falls for a mysterious woman who grounds the girls and bans them from staying up late to save the day. But it turns out that she is one of their many antagonists, Sedusa.

episodes.name: Insect Inside / Powerpuff Bluff
episodes.summary: "Insect Inside" The city of Townsville becomes overrun by millions of cockroaches, led by their leader Roach Coach. The Powerpuff Girls must fight their fear of bugs in order to save the city. "Powerpuff Bluff" After putting 3 criminals to jail those 3 criminals dress up as the Powerpuff Girls. Spreading crime wherever they go these impostors ruin the girls' reputation.

episodes.name: Octi Evil / Geshundfight
episodes.summary: "Octi-Evil" Him is out to break up the Powerpuff Girls, and uses Bubbles sweetness to do it via Bubbles' stuffed octopus, Octi. "Geshundfight" The amoeba boys try to commit a crime and accidentally get the whole city of Townsville sick.

episodes.name: Buttercrush / Fuzzy Logic
episodes.summary: "Buttercrush" Buttercup develops a crush on Ace, the leader of the Gang Green Gang. They soon take advantage of this to put Blossom and Bubbles into terrible danger. "Fuzzy Logic" A squirrel trespasses on Fuzzy Lumpkins private property. Fuzzy chases him all the way into Townsville and goes crazy hurting all the citizens that stand in his way.

episodes.name: Boogie Frights / Abracadaver
episodes.summary: In "Boogie Frights", the Boogie Man comes up with a plan to forever keep out light in order to operate freely, but the Powerpuff Girls are on the job in a jiffy. In "Abracadaver", a long-dead resident magician, Al Lusion, comes back to life as a zombie, and the girls have some difficulty in trying to stop him.

episodes.name: Telephonies / Tough Love
episodes.summary: "Telephonies" The Gangreen Gang gets hold of the Powerpuff Girls Hotline and makes crank calls, sending the Girls on a wild goose chase trying to protect the town. "Tough Love" The citizens of Townsville loves The Powerpuff Girls and its annoying Him, so Him turns everyone's love for the Powerpuff Girls into hate.

episodes.name: Major Competition / Mr. Mojo's Rising
episodes.summary: "Major Competition" The Powerpuff Girl's place as crime fighters is taken when Major Man comes to town. The PPGs eventually figure out that Major Man is actually faking disasters just so he can "save the day." "Mr. Mojo's Rising" Mojo Jojo kidnaps the Professor in a plot to steal the girls' powers when they arrive.

episodes.name: Paste Makes Waste / Ice Sore
episodes.summary: In "Paste Makes Waste", one of the Pokey Oaks Kindergarten students has a bad habit of eating glue and Buttercup just can't resist picking on him for this. But when he accidentally eats some radioactive glue and turns into a giant glue monster, it's up to Buttercup to apologize for her behavior toward him to reverse the process. In "Ice Sore", during an intense heat wave, Blossom develops a new superpower, one that makes her sisters jealous, but her schoolmates popular with her: ice breath.

episodes.name: Bubblevicious / The Bare Facts
episodes.summary: "Bubblevicious" Blossom and Buttercup train in the danger room in the Professor's lab at high levels, but Bubbles' trains on the lower levels. Mad at her family for being treated like a baby, she tries to be hardcore like her sisters. "The Bare Facts" Mojo kidnaps the Mayor and the Powerpuff Girls rescue him, but when the Mayor tries to get the story out of them each Powerpuff Girl has their own version.

episodes.name: Cat Man Do / Impeach Fuzz
episodes.summary: "Cat Man Do" The Girls save an innocent little Kitty from the clutches of an evil villain. Eventually they learn that Kitty is the true villain when he hypnotizes the Professor in an evil plot to take over the world. "Impeach Fuzz" The Mayor creates a commotion in Townsville about being re-elected as Mayor again, but he wakes up Fuzzy Lumpkins who get's annoyed. The people like Fuzzy and vote him Mayor.

episodes.name: Just Another Manic Mojo / Mime for a Change
episodes.summary: In "Just Another Manic Mojo", Mojo Jojo's morning routine is disrupted by the Powerpuff Girls when their ball that they are playing with ends up in his lair. Mojo then uses this opportunity to try and eliminate his nemeses for good. In "Mime for a Change", Rainbow the Clown is accidentally transformed by bleach into an evil mime who can eliminate color and sound.

episodes.name: The Rowdyruff Boys
episodes.summary: Mojo Jojo is so outraged at his constant defeats against the Powerpuff Girls that he decides to beat them at their own games, by creating The Rowdyruff Boys, who prove superior fighters to the girls.

episodes.name: Uh-Oh, Dynamo
episodes.summary: Worried about his little girls' safety, the Professor creates Powerpuff Dynamo, a state-of-the-art protection system.

episodes.name: Stuck Up, Up, and Away / Schoolhouse Rocked
episodes.summary: "Stuck Up, Up, and Away" Bratty little Princess comes to town and wants to be a Powerpuff Girl. When she doesn't get what she wants, the Girls will have to pay. "Schoolhouse Rocked" After being arrested by a truant officer(school policeman) the Gang Green Gang goes back to kindergarten and invades Pokey Oaks with tricks up their sleeves.

episodes.name: Collect Her / Supper Villain
episodes.summary: "Collect Her" Lenny Baxter, a rabid fan of Powerpuff Girls memorabilia, collects every bit of Powerpuff stuff available. When he finally has everything, he decides to collect the girls themselves. "Supper Villain" Next door neighbor Harold Smith can't stand the Powerpuff Girls so he creates a super villain identity to beat the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: Birthday Bash / Too Pooped to Puff
episodes.summary: "Birthday Bash" It's the Girls birthday, and they must deal with destructive gifts from their main enemies: Mojo Jojo, Princess the Amoeba Boys, and Him. "Too Pooped to Puff" The citizens of Townsville take advantage of the Powerpuff Girls and the girls' go out on a strike.

episodes.name: Beat Your Greens / Down n' Dirty
episodes.summary: "Beat Your Greens" When Broccoli Aliens from space invade Townsville, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls and all the children to take a bite out of crime. "Down n' Dirty" Buttercup loves to fight monsters but taking a bath gets in the way, so to continue fighting monsters she doesn't take a bath for 3 days.

episodes.name: Dream Scheme / You Snooze You Lose
episodes.summary: "Dream Scheme" The Sandman would like a little rest, so he puts the world to sleep. The Girls must battle him in his dreams to get things back to normal. "You Snooze You Lose" Mojo Jojo creates the perfect plan to destroying The Powerpuff Girls ever, but because of an open window in his home Mojo's plan's fall into the Amoeba Boys' hands.

episodes.name: Slave the Day / Los Dos Mojos
episodes.summary: "Slave the Day" When the Girls save Big Billy's life, he feels forever in their debt, and becomes their slave. When he begins to get in the way of their crime fighting , they allow him to save their lives so he'll finally leave them alone. "Los Dos Mojos" Bubbles gets hit on the head by Mojo and gets amnesia.

episodes.name: A Very Special Blossom / Daylight Savings
episodes.summary: "A Very Special Blossom" When the Professor wants an expensive gift for Father's Day, Blossom makes the mistake of stealing what she can't afford (Pro-Excellence golf clubs) instead of giving from the heart. "Daylight Savings" The Powerpuff Girls save the day before and after their bedtime, and by the time they're at school they always sleep in class. Annoyed by this Ms. Keane talks to the Professor and he gives them a curfew.

episodes.name: Mo Job / Pet Feud
episodes.summary: "Mo Job" Princess hires Mojo to devise the perfect plan to destroy the Girls, and they are quite shocked when they find that Princess has powers equal to theirs. "Pet Feud" The Professor creates a pet for the girls' that can only be fed once!

episodes.name: Imaginary Fiend / Cootie Gras
episodes.summary: In "Imaginary Fiend", a new kid at school proves so unpopular with his classmates that he conjures up an imaginary friend, who turns out to be quite destructive. In "Cootie Gras", one of Pokey Oaks' students develops the cooties and everyone in school, even the Powerpuff Girls, are avoiding him. Mojo Jojo uses the situation to his advantage.

episodes.name: The Powerpuff Girls' Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever / Just Desserts
episodes.summary: "The Powerpuff Girls Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever" It's raining in Townsville and there is no crime or villainy afoot. So the Girls must stay inside and come up with their very own Powerpuff adventure. "Just Desserts" Harold Smith finally gets paroled out of jail, and when he comes back to his adoring family they end up hating the Powerpuff Girls just as much as he does. Equipped with all sorts of high tech weapons the Smith's take their revenge out on the Utonium family.

episodes.name: Twisted Sister / Cover Up
episodes.summary: "Twisted Sister" The girls desperately want a fourth sibling, and because they know how they were created, the girls make their own, who proves to be a bit more unusual than they would expect. "Cover Up" The tough Buttercup's secret is revealed when her sister's learn that Buttercup's source of power is her little green blankie.

episodes.name: Speed Demon / Mojo Jonesin'
episodes.summary: "Speed Demon" The Girls accidentally fly the speed of light and when they arrive home, everything has changed. Fifty years have passed and the world has been taken over by Him, since the Girls weren't around to defeat him. "Mojo Jonesin'" The kids at Pokey Oaks really like The Powerpuff Girls, so Mojo gives a few kids a dose of chemical X.

episodes.name: Something's a Ms. / Slumbering with the Enemy
episodes.summary: "Something's a Ms." Miss Bellum is acting very strange lately. And she keeps showing up at crime scenes. It turns out that Sedusa is back, has kidnapped Ms. Bellum and has been impersonating her in order to steal money and jewels. "Slumbering with the Enemy" The Powerpuff Girls throw a slumber party and invites every girl in their school to come. By the time they give their invitation out to the last girl Mojo steals it and comes to the party dressed up as Mojesha.

episodes.name: Fallen Arches / The Mane Event
episodes.summary: "Fallen Arches" A gang of old-time villains come out of retirement when they discover the town is being protected by little girls. When the Girls realize that they can't fight their elders, they must enlist the best superhero team of the past to save the city. "The Mane Event" Bubbles and Buttercup do Blossom's hair, but when it gets tangled they give Blossom a bad hair day.

episodes.name: Town and Out / Child Fearing
episodes.summary: "Town and Out" When the Professor gets a new job, the Girls have to move to a new town. They try to make the best of it, but it's just not the same. In fact, it's awful. "Child Fearing" The Professor has to go out to an award's ceremony. He forgets to call the babysitter so he calls the Mayor who calls up Mojo Jojo to babysit.

episodes.name: Criss-Cross Crisis
episodes.summary: A failed experiment on the Professor's part causes everyone in Townsville to switch bodies around. Mojo Jojo, also switched, tries to use the situation to his advantage.

episodes.name: Bubblevision / Bought and Scold
episodes.summary: "Bubble Vision" Bubbles fighting has been really terribly lately and the Professor discovers that she needs glasses. Bubbles is humiliated by these huge, horrible things and never wants to see or be seen again. "Bought and Scold" Princess buys Townsville and makes crime legal.

episodes.name: Gettin' Twiggy with It / Cop Out
episodes.summary: "Gettin' Twiggy With It" Mitch is told to take care of Twiggy, the class hamster for the weekend. But the Girls don't trust him and follow him home. When Mitch flushes Twiggy down the toilet, the Girls are about to attack, but Twiggy emerges bigger and badder than ever. "Cop Out" A lazy cop named Mike Bricoski lets his other fellow cops do the dirty work for him, but when he gets fired he takes his revenge out on the Powerpuff Girls.

episodes.name: Three Girls and a Monster / Monkey See, Doggie Two
episodes.summary: "Three Girls and a Monster" The Girls are once again in a furious battle with a ferocious monster. But Blossom and Buttercup can't agree on how to fight the beast and Bubbles just wants everyone to get along. "Monkey See, Doggie Two" Mojo Jojo turns the world into dogs again. The Powerpuff Girls come to the rescue wondering why Mojo does the same plan again. He tells them that he's found a fatal flaw in his old plan as he watches a video of his old plan.

episodes.name: Jewel of the Aisle / Super Zeros
episodes.summary: "Jewel of the Aisle" A crook hides a huge diamond in a box of the Girls favorite cereal. He must figure out how to trick the Girls into giving him some cereal and getting the jewel back. "Super Zeros" After some inspiration from their favorite comics Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup try to become better heroes.

episodes.name: Candy is Dandy / Catastrophe
episodes.summary: "Candy is Dandy" When the Mayor gives the Girls some candy as a thank you for saving the day, the Girls become hooked on the stuff. They make a deal with a local villain to commit crimes just so they can get their treat. "Catastrophe" An unbeatable slime monster comes to Townsville.

episodes.name: Hot Air Buffoon / Ploys R' Us
episodes.summary: "Hot Air Buffoon" The Mayor realizes that the Girls are doing all the work in his city for him. So he mans a hot air balloon and starts fighting crime the old fashioned way. "Ploys R' Us" The Professor sleepwalks and steals toys at the same time. When the girls' find this out they have fun taking advantage of the situation.

episodes.name: The Headsucker's Moxy / Equal Fights
episodes.summary: "The Headsucker's Moxy" There's a mysterious villain in town who's sucking pertinent information from the brains of powerful people and committing crimes. How do the Girls trap this sucker before his next victim is drained? "Equal Fights" A female villain named Femme Fatale teaches the girls' to be sexist, so she can get away with crimes.

episodes.name: Powerprof.
episodes.summary: The Girls are so busy fighting crime that the Professor doesn't get to see them anymore. He creates a super suit for himself so he can fight crime with them. The Girls are having a great time with their dad until he starts cramping their superhero style.

episodes.name: Moral Decay / Meet the Beat-Alls
episodes.summary: "Moral Decay" When Buttercup accidentally knocks out Bubbles' tooth, she learns that tooth decay does pay and soon goes on a spree knocking out teeth and collecting the cash. "Meet the Beat-Alls" Mojo Jojo, Princess Morebucks, Fuzzy Lumpkins, and Him all team up as The Beat Alls to defeat the Powerpuff Girls. All is going well until Mojo Jojo falls in love with Moko Jono who breaks up the Beat Alls.

episodes.name: Helter Shelter / Power Lunch
episodes.summary: "Helter Shelter" Bubbles has a habit of saving helpless animals and the Professor is sick of it. When Bubbles brings a baby whale home, she and her sisters have a whale of a time hiding this new addition. "Power Lunch" The Gang Green Gang raids a mini mart eating all types of foods. When the Powerpuff Girls arrive they use their heat vision which causes a chain reaction which gives the Gang Green Gang super powers.

episodes.name: Film Flam
episodes.summary: "Film Flam" A sleazy director comes to Townsville ready to make a film about the Girls saving the day in their city. But this Hollywood-type wants more from Townsville than an Oscar winning film.

episodes.name: All Chalked Up
episodes.summary: "All Chalked Up" Him tricks Bubbles into bringing her chalk drawings to life, who then reek havoc on Townsville.

episodes.name: Get Back, Jojo
episodes.summary: It is Career Day at Pokey Oaks, and the Professor shows to the class a time machine and explains how he got into science and created the Powerpuff Girls. But Mojo Jojo overhears everything and uses the machine to go back in time to that specific time period in order to prevent him from getting into science at all costs. But the Powerpuff Girls also go back in time and are hot on Mojo's trail.

episodes.name: Super Friends
episodes.summary: "Super Friends" The new girl next door learns its hard to be best friends with superheroes and soon starts hanging out with the wrong kind of kid-Princess.

episodes.name: Members Only
episodes.summary: "Members Only" When the Girls try to join the all-male superhero organization, they learn that sometimes supermen aren't so super.

episodes.name: Him Diddle Riddle
episodes.summary: "Him Diddle Riddle" The PPGs must solve a series of riddles by Him to prevent the Professor having to "pay." The entire episode is in real time.

episodes.name: Nano of the North
episodes.summary: "Nano of the North" It's raining in Townsville, but this is more than just rain. These drops are really microscopic robots tearing apart the city and the Girls must fight with these creatures on their own level.

episodes.name: Forced Kin
episodes.summary: "Forced Kin" A terrible, evil menace from outer space descends upon Townsville. The Girls must fight evil with evil but to do so they seek the advice of ...Mojo Jojo.

episodes.name: Stray Bullet
episodes.summary: "Stray Bullet" In order to save an innocent squirrel, Bubbles gives him a dash of Chemical X, giving him some super squirrel powers.

episodes.name: Knock It Off
episodes.summary: "Knock it Off" When the Professor's college roommate sees his brilliant creations, he decides to cash in on the popularity of the Powerpuffs.

episodes.name: Keen on Keane / Not So Awesome Blossom
episodes.summary: "Keen on Keane" It's Valentine's Day and the Girls notice that Ms. Keane is all alone. Time for a little matchmaking. But who will the lucky fella be? "Not So Awesome Blossom" After losing a battle with Mojo's robots (which Buttercup defeats) Blossom suddenly becomes a jinx and starts messing up everything.

episodes.name: Power-Noia
episodes.summary: The Powerpuff Girls have to overcome their greatest fears after Him has brought them to life.

episodes.name: Monstra-City / Shut the Pup Up
episodes.summary: "Monstra City" When all the Monsters move from Monster Isle to Townsville it's up to the Girls to keep the peace. "Shut the Pup Up" After witnessing a crime, Talking Dog stays at the Powerpuff Girls house for a while as part of a witness protection program.

episodes.name: Toast of the Town / Divide and Conquer
episodes.summary: "Toast Of The Town" When the Mayor rubs on Chemical X on his head for hair growth, all of him grows and stomps through Townsville. "Divide and Conquer" After stealing a tangerine (orange) and watching it split up into different pieces the Amoeba Boys learn how to multiply and make duplicates of themselves.

episodes.name: Burglar Alarmed / Shotgun Wedding
episodes.summary: "Burglar Alarmed" A new burglar comes to Townsville and his first robbery is at the house of...The Powerpuff Girls? "Shotgun Wedding" The Professor tries to figure out just what kind of species Fuzzy Lumpkins is, but when he accidentally gets covered in mud and flowers it makes him look like a Lumpkin which Fuzzy falls in love with and tries to marry.

episodes.name: Save Mojo / Substitute Creature
episodes.summary: "Save Mojo" An animal activist group sets out to protect Mojo, ensuring that he can behave like the naturally evil monkey that he is. "Substitute Creature" When Ms. Keane gets sick she hires a substitute teacher named Mr.Green to run the class in her absence. Unfortunately because of his monstrous appearance the girls assume he's a bad guy and try to save their classmates from him.

episodes.name: The Boys Are Back in Town
episodes.summary: Him is sick and tired of all the villains (including himself) failing in their never-ending plot to destroy the Powerpuff Girls, so he brings the Rowdyruff Boys back to life and stronger than ever.

episodes.name: Pee Pee G's / Boy Toys
episodes.summary: "The Pee Pee G's" When the Girls wake up to discover their bed is wet, none want to admit that they are the guilty party. "Boy Toys" Princess interrupts a battle between the Powerpuff Girls and the Rowdyruff Boys. She tries to join the Rowdyruff Boys but they reject her, so out of pity the girls let Princess become a Powerpuff Girl.

episodes.name: Seed No Evil / City of Clipsville
episodes.summary: "Seed No Evil" When a prehistoric Caveman thaws out in Townsville, the Girls must stop him from stealing the Mayor's seeds. "City of Clipsville" While cleaning out their closet the Powerpuff Girls reminisce on all the adventures they've had over the years.

episodes.name: Lying Around the House / Bubble Boy
episodes.summary: "Lying Around the House" The Girls tell little white lies that turn into a big, bad problem. "Bubble Boy" While causing havoc in Townsville the Rowdyruff Boys tell Boomer to steal some candy for them.

episodes.name: A Documentary / Girls Gone Mild
episodes.summary: "Documentary" A film student attempts to do a documentary on the Powerpuff Girls and learns that catching these superheroes at rest is harder than he thought. "Girls Gone Mild" When and organization called Parents Against Powerpuffs tell the Girls that their super-heroics are becoming too imitable for children, the Girls must hold back on fighting crime.

episodes.name: Nuthin' Special / Neighbor Hood
episodes.summary: "Nuthin Special" Frustrated with not knowing what her Special Power isButtercup Hunts to discover what makes her special. "Neighbor Hood" When a TV show convinces kids to send in money to enter a special contest, Bubbles and the rest of the kids in the neighbor hood raise money to enter it.

episodes.name: I See a Funny Cartoon in Your Future / Octi-Gone
episodes.summary: "I See a Funny Cartoon in Your Future" The Girls have the rare task of fighting a Medium who is committing petty thefts. "Octi-Gone" Professor Utonium is hosting a party for all the rich and famous people in Townsville, so Bubbles makes sure that she is the most beautiful of the girls by continually grooming herself.

episodes.name: See Me, Feel Me, Gnomey
episodes.summary: In this musical, the girls are outmatched by Townsville's villains. They turn to Gnomey to bring peace to Townsville in exchange for their powers, but, when the city falls under the rule of Communism, it's up to the girls to stop him.

episodes.name: Curses / Bang for Your Buck
episodes.summary: "Curses" When Bubbles overhears the Professor saying some bad words, the Girls add a whole new slew of adjectives to their vocabulary. "Bang for Your Buck" When the Girls and the Gangreen Gang discover a destructo ray for sale at Mojo's Yard Sale, each team sets out to see who can earn the most money and buy it first.

episodes.name: Silent Treatment / Sweet n Sour
episodes.summary: "The Silent Treatment" When the Girls go to see a silent movie with the Professor, they end up getting pulled into the film by the old time villain. "Sweet n Sour" A new group of criminals, which is a group of cute little animals robs Townsville blind. The girls try to stop them, but because of their innocent looks the animal criminals have the advantage.

episodes.name: Prime Apes / Coupe d'Etat
episodes.summary: "Prime Mates" Back when Mojo Jojo tried to take over the world with primates, there was one monkey who didn't get his due-Mopey Popo. Now Mopey is back to try and be evil just as Mojo intended. "Coupe d'Etat" When the Professor tries out his car, the Girls realize that this K.A.R.R. is taking the Professor away from them, both figuratively and literally.

episodes.name: Makes Zen to Me / Say Uncle
episodes.summary: "Makes Zen to Me" When Buttercup gets a fortune cookie saying that "Peace Lies Within" the most violent of Powerpuffs sets out on a quest for inner peace. "Say Uncle" The Professor tells the girls all about his younger brother Eugene and how he was such a wild man back in the day.

episodes.name: Reeking Havoc / Live and Let Dynamo
episodes.summary: "Reeking Havoc" This year, the Professor's submission for the 2nd Annual Townsville Chili Cookoff is X-tra Special, but this X-tra Special ingredient doesn't settle well with Townsville's tummies. "Live and Let Dynamo" Dynamo returns and this time is against Townsville and destroying the town along with terrorizing it's citizens.

episodes.name: Mo' Linguish / Oops, I Did It Again
episodes.summary: "Mo' Linguish" Mojo is sentenced to do community service for Townsville and begins teaching English at the Learning Annex. Soon everyone is speaking in circles like Mojo and the town comes to a standstill. "Oops, I Did It Again" When the Professor realizes that all his successful experiments are actually just accidents, he sets out to do something brilliant on purpose!

episodes.name: A Made Up Story
episodes.summary: "A Made Up Story" Someone is defacing all the posters and statues of Townsville with make-up. Can the Girls stop this makeover takeover or will they get the blush off?

episodes.name: Little Miss Interprets / Night Mayor
episodes.summary: "Little Miss Interprets" When the Girls hear the Professor trying to make something out of sugar, spice, and everything nice, they are sure he's trying to create new little girls. "Night Mayor" The Mayor keeps having the same dream over and over again, but he never sees the end. Now it's up Girls to go into the Mayor's head and solve this mystery.

episodes.name: Custody Battle / The City of Nutsvillle
episodes.summary: "Custody Battle" Mojo discovers that the Rowdyruff Boys are back and is determined to show them that he is a more evil dad than Him. "The City of Nutsvillle" One day during a picnic Bubbles get stung in her mouth by a bee. After a visit by the doctor she is forbidden to speak for a week. Suddenly when all the squirrels in Townsville get mad, Blossom and Buttercup are unable to do anything without Bubbles special ability. Now it's up to Bubbles and Bullet to stop this crime.

episodes.name: Aspirations
episodes.summary: The Gangreen Gang is actually committing brilliant crimes, but, behind every great gang, there has to be a great woman.

episodes.name: That's Not My Baby! / Simian Says
episodes.summary: "That's Not My Baby!" The Girls save a baby from a Monster attacking Townsville, but can't find the mother. Can these three superheroes manage to take care of one little baby? "Simian Says" After the Narrator is kidnapped by Mojo Jojo, he decides to narrate and control the Powerpuff Girls actions.

episodes.name: Sun Scream / The City of Frownsville
episodes.summary: "Sun Scream" The Girls get the ultimate sunburn and must try to fight crime despite their UV damage. "The City of Frownsville" Lou Gubrious sets a crying ray on Townsville.

episodes.name: West in Pieces
episodes.summary: "West in Pieces" It's the old west and Mojo the Kid has robbed the first bank ever and forced the sheriff out of town and it is up to the Steamypuff Girls to save the day at a high-noon showdown.

episodes.name: Crazy Mixed Up Puffs / Mizzen in Action
episodes.summary: "Crazy Mixed Up Puffs" The girls must literally work as one to try and stop Mojo from destroying Townsville. "Mizzen in Action" Captain Crack McGraigen and his crew are tossed forward in time.

episodes.name: What's the Big Idea? / Roughing It Up
episodes.summary: "What's the Big Idea?" Twenty stories tall, The Powerpuff Girls spell disaster for Townsville when they delicately try to stop Mojo Jojo from taking over. "Roughing It Up" The Girls and the Professor set on an old-fashioned vacation to the Townsville Swamp. Trouble is, Fuzzy and his nephews are there too.
